subject: Education
title: Video: Why Some Educational Videos Work and Others Don't
description: A fast breakdown of Video: Why Some Educational Videos Work and Others Don't for builders.

hook.text: A 60-minute recorded lecture gets 6 minutes of average watch time. A 6-minute explainer gets 5.

buildup.text: Educational videos flooded the internet, but most violate every principle of multimedia learning.

discovery.text: Effective videos are short (under 9 min), conversational, and weave visuals tightly with narration.

twist.text: Adding interactive questions mid-video doubles retention compared to passive watching.

climax.text: The best educational videos feel like a conversation, not a performance.

punchline.text: A short video that makes you think beats a long one that lets you zone out.

quiz.question: What makes educational videos most effective?
options: Short length, conversational tone, tight visual-narration integration, and embedded questions
High production value with professional actors
Maximum possible length to cover all material
